attributes.action: Give medallic recognition to all NHS staff involved in the coronavirus pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: As we are all aware without the support of the NHS during this pandemic we wouldn't be in such a good place with vaccines and survival rates etc. The physical and mental stress is very much similar to that of a war zone during these testing times. A medal is worn with pride and a holds the memory of the highs and lows to look back upon whether that's with friends or grandchildren in the future.
attributes.background: The government to show gratitude to the NHS frontline staff rather than offer a financial bonus, which would cost the government millions. A medal and a ribbon that could be worn with honour on their uniform day in day out.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

NHS staff should be awarded a service medal for working through covid-19.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560402
